info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 03 at 5:15PM CDT until August 03 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Illinois, including the following counties, in south central Illinois, Montgomery. In southwest Illinois, Macoupin. * WHEN...Until 830 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 515 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Litchfield, Hillsboro, Staunton, Gillespie, Nokomis, Mount Olive, Bunker Hill, Benld, Raymond, Witt, Shipman, Schram City, Wilsonville, Sawyerville, Mount Clare, East Gillespie, Eagarville, Piasa, Irving and Medora.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
